net.sf.jasperreports.components

Class ComponentsXmlWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jasperreports.components.ComponentsXmlWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentXmlWriter

    public class ComponentsXmlWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentXmlWriter
    XML writer for built-in component implementations.
    Version:
    $Id: ComponentsXmlWriter.java 6252 2013-06-11 09:11:24Z shertage $
    Author:
    Lucian Chirita (lucianc@users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
